subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: While its coach, Steve Lavin, recovers from surgery, the St. John’s men’s basketball team has had to deal with the comings and goings of players that have left it with a depleted roster.
snippet: While its coach, Steve Lavin, recovers from surgery, the St. John’s men’s basketball team has had to deal with the comings and goings of players that have left it with a depleted roster.
